name: Tomato Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Toast bread, add cheese and tomato, and grill it.

name: Veggie Stir Fry
instructions: Stir fry veggies in soy sauce and serve hot.

name: Banana Smoothie
instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth. Serve chilled.

name: Garlic Butter Rice
instructions: Cook rice, sauté garlic in butter, mix together, and garnish with parsley.

name: Pancakes
instructions: Mix all ingredients, cook on a pan, and serve with syrup.

name: Omelette
instructions: Whisk eggs, add chopped onion and tomato, cook in a pan.

name: Spaghetti Aglio e Olio
instructions: Boil spaghetti, sauté garlic in olive oil, mix together with chili flakes.

name: Fruit Salad
instructions: Chop all fruits, mix with honey, and serve fresh.

name: Chickpea Salad
instructions: Mix all ingredients in a bowl and serve fresh.

name: Grilled Chicken
instructions: Marinate chicken with garlic, olive oil, and lemon. Grill until golden.
